idea generation twins data creativity ratings.csv
input_files.note: Uses 'labels' instead of 'values'; requires additional creativity ratings and wave score files; EXCLUDED from test_all_evaluations.py because: (1) it requires downloading a 1.5GB Word2Vec model (word2vec-google-news-300) for computing creativity metrics (DAT_perf and SSPT), and (2) the creativity rating files are not available on Hugging Face or in the standard dataset distribution
